statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 5 \\ 5 \\ 1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ 12 \\ 11 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 5 \\ 5 \\ 1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ 12 \\ 11 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
